headline: PPG announces planned retirement of Vince Morales, senior vice president and chief financial officer
summary: PITTSBURGH, December 01, 2025--PPG (NYSE:PPG) today announced that Vincent (Vince) J. Morales, who has served as senior vice president and chief financial officer since 2017 and is a 40-plus-year veteran of the company, has announced his intention to retire July 1, 2026. Morales is a member and secretary of PPG’s operating committee and member of the executive committee.
